name: Stairs to Life
description:
This is an unfinished project I did for college. It got me an excellent grade but I don´t plan to continue it for now.

You play as Mark. A violent guy who gets hit by truck after he beated up someone.

He wakes up in an abandoned hospital in where his "trial" begins. In this trial, he must prove to someone he deserves a second chance. Most of what he encounters is hard to look at for him.
